long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is not just a random extension. It's the home base of Vladint Technologies. Here you can find all the links related to Vladint Tech. Including, Vladint Tech's Twitter, Youtube and what started it all, the Vladint Technologies website. So download today! Your #1 free Chrome extension!
